summary: THE TRANSMISSION ON MY 2001 FORD ESCAPE, WENT OUT I HAD 58,000 MILES ON THE TRUCK. HAD TO PUT IN A NEW TRANSMISSION.  NOW 4 MONTHS LATER, THE ENGINE LIGHT COMES ON.   THE ENGINE COOLANT WARNING LIGHT KEEPS COMING ON EVEN THOUGH IT IS FULL.   ALL OF THE LIGHTERS/SUN  ROOF HAVE NO POWER TO THEM THEY ALL QUIT.  I HAVE REPLACED ALL FUSES, WITH NO LUCK.  NOW THE ALL LIGHTS ON THE RADIO ARE GONE, BUT THE RADIO STILL WORKS.  *AK
